name: TerraCraft (XSectorZ)
description: Current Version: v1.0 This is my first game development from Godot Game Engine. It took me about 2 weeks to develop this game. I hope you enjoy the game. How to Play You will have to kill monsters that will destroy your ship. to earn points If your health runs out or your ship runs out of health, you lose. (in-game tutorial) Controls KeyDescriptionAWalk leftDWalk rightFUse special abilityESCPause MenuSPACEJumpL-CLICKAttack Items ItemDescriptionRed PotionHeal 30 hpGreen PotionSpeed upCursed SkullInstant kill everything in one hit  Credits Sprites : [x] Pirate sprites by pixelfrog [x] Bomber sprites by pixelfrog Sounds : [x] Mario Sounds by themushroomkingdom [x] Background Sounds by fesliyanstudio [x] Button Hover Sounds by myinstant [x] Bomb Sounds by pixabay Developer: [x] TerraCraft devs by XsectorZ
